actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: Joint resolution to clarify and reaffirm Government purchasing policies.

summary.text: States that it is the policy of the United States to rely upon private commercial sources for goods and services required to meet Government needs, unless: (1) such reliance would demonstrably disrupt or significantly delay an urgent agency program; or (2) in-house performance is mandatory for national security; or (3) the product or service is not and cannot be made available from the private sector and is available from a Federal source.

titles.title: Joint resolution to clarify and reaffirm Government purchasing policies.
